selected_links.title: Report a missed bin collection | Sheffield City Council
strengths: Direct connection to report missed collections
Official website of Sheffield City Council
selected_links.reasoning: The title of the link explicitly states 'Report a missed bin collection', which is most relevant to the council customer information needs. The official city council website also adds credibility.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: Although the content does not directly offer a solution for reporting a missed bin collection, the 'Report a missed collection’ option is provided in the list items under the heading 'Why didn't my bin get collected today?' indicating that it might be possible to report a missed bin collection by following this path.
Reason.next_actions: Navigate to the webpage linked from the 'Report a missed collection’ option (not provided) and check if one can submit a missed bin collection report.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content does provide some information relevant to council residents about handling missed bin collections, but it lacks direct guidance on how to report a missed collection. A more resident-friendly approach would be to offer clear and actionable steps for reporting a missed collection directly within the content, along with an option for immediate actions.
